snippet: The ratings Wednesday night were down from the year before, but in the range of the week before. But, notably, the singing contest will not be No. 1 this week among 18- to 49-year-old viewers.
abstract: The ratings Wednesday night were down from the year before, but in the range of the week before. But, notably, the singing contest will not be No. 1 this week among 18- to 49-year-old viewers.
lead_paragraph: The clouds over "American Idol" finally parted this week.

headline.main: Ratings Decline at 'American Idol' May Have Leveled Off
